revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_WraithRaiseInit'''
(''no parameter'')
Makes the actor visible and removes the {{Flag|NONSHOOTABLE}} and {{Flag|DONTBLAST}} flags while setting the {{Flag|SHOOTABLE}} and {{Flag|SOLID}} flags. The actor's floor clip is set to its height. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|WraithBuried}} and derived classes.
